title: 'Forgive us' Ukraine: hopeless dread grips Russia's war critics
description: Alexandra and Anna, both 27, were among a steady trickle of Russians at Ukraine's embassy in Moscow on Sunday who voiced shame, anguish and a sense of utter hopelessness after Russia's invasion, offering heartfelt apologies to Ukrainians.
content: MOSCOW, Feb 27 (Reuters) - Alexandra and Anna, both 27, were among a steady trickle of Russians at Ukraine's embassy in Moscow on Sunday who voiced shame, anguish and a sense of utter hopelessness afâ€¦ [+4075 chars]
